Detailed Description

Allows to encode JPEG images from various source formats like RGB and YUV. It's possible to specify the destination resolution and quality level.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Initializes the JpegEncoder with the JPEG encoding parameters.

Destructor, frees all required memory which were needed for encoding
